title: Good\_Taste\_Need\_Font\_ID
content:
Greetings Typo Comrades! I need info on the font, thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516124540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSCN5694_4407.jpg)
author: Typedog

comments.content:
Yes, "GODIVA" is [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20120516124540/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/optima/).

Can't say what "Chocolatier" is set in.

Thanks Comrades! It is a great package design. I can imagine it was  
expensive to make.

Guerrizmo+Design
